615e03fd-8c54-46de-aa17-c404a0c90972.name: Oxygen Storage
615e03fd-8c54-46de-aa17-c404a0c90972.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

4bda3c98-1915-4f55-bc7c-081867502fd8.name: Oxygen Storage
4bda3c98-1915-4f55-bc7c-081867502fd8.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

1f2735b5-f4bb-477e-bbb0-3db31abd923b.name: Oxygen Storage
1f2735b5-f4bb-477e-bbb0-3db31abd923b.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

d2b038c8-7a9a-46f7-9d59-b3b04b71816b.name: Oxygen Storage
d2b038c8-7a9a-46f7-9d59-b3b04b71816b.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

5716e81f-6080-4081-8e31-f85bec097525.name: Oxygen Storage
5716e81f-6080-4081-8e31-f85bec097525.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

9da89dbc-86a8-4236-8aac-72041575c043.name: Flight
9da89dbc-86a8-4236-8aac-72041575c043.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

614d41a1-e44c-4d5c-ac6f-f9ccba04439a.name: Diffuse
614d41a1-e44c-4d5c-ac6f-f9ccba04439a.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

235c9bce-a0d4-4789-88b3-6d02ca7e0313.name: Homogenous
235c9bce-a0d4-4789-88b3-6d02ca7e0313.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

3a1ac8be-d881-4faa-bf4b-0d4c2dd3d284.name: No Blood
3a1ac8be-d881-4faa-bf4b-0d4c2dd3d284.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

68ea2f30-ce15-4eee-89a1-e29a0c0c5455.name: No Brain
68ea2f30-ce15-4eee-89a1-e29a0c0c5455.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

4c844541-5634-4f2d-8bbf-c2fd425a11b6.name: No Eyes
4c844541-5634-4f2d-8bbf-c2fd425a11b6.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d8c49f8c-40e6-4aff-99c9-9c91cf558135.name: No Head
d8c49f8c-40e6-4aff-99c9-9c91cf558135.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

700f1810-531b-4746-8900-3374b02bd3d5.name: No Neck
700f1810-531b-4746-8900-3374b02bd3d5.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

0f5d7474-4a73-4d98-8fb0-43ff776b58d8.name: No Vitals
0f5d7474-4a73-4d98-8fb0-43ff776b58d8.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

73f335fb-572e-4ae7-a816-d2c3f56d25f8.name: Unliving
73f335fb-572e-4ae7-a816-d2c3f56d25f8.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
